Operation 'get-transaction' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. The current summary 'Get bank transaction' is too generic and doesn't specify the retrieval mechanism (by ID). The description, while containing useful context, lacks clarity about what data is returned and doesn't explicitly state the prerequisite requirement clearly enough for AI agents. The improved version specifies the retrieval method, clarifies the immutable nature of transaction data, explicitly states the prerequisite, and indicates what the response contains, making it more actionable for AI agents determining when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description:
The *Get transaction* endpoint returns a single transaction for a given transactionId.

[Transactions](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Transaction) provide an immutable source of up-to-date information on income and expenditure.
 
Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a single bank transaction by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single bank transaction for the specified transaction ID. Returns immutable transaction data including income and expenditure information. This operation requires that company data has been previously retrieved via the refresh-company-data endpoint. The response includes the complete Transaction object with all associated details.
data.reasoning: The current summary 'Get bank transaction' is too generic and doesn't specify the retrieval mechanism (by ID). The description, while containing useful context, lacks clarity about what data is returned and doesn't explicitly state the prerequisite requirement clearly enough for AI agents. The improved version specifies the retrieval method, clarifies the immutable nature of transaction data, explicitly states the prerequisite, and indicates what the response contains, making it more actionable for AI agents determining when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'list-account-balances' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity on pagination support, required parameters, and query parameter capabilities. Enhanced version specifies pagination, required inputs, filtering/sorting capabilities, and return structure for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description:
The *List account balances* endpoint returns a list of [account balances](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/AccountBalance) for a given company's connection.

[Account balances](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/AccountBalance) are balances for a bank account, including end-of-day batch balance or running balances per transaction.

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated account balances for a company
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of account balances for a given company's connection. Account balances include end-of-day batch balances or running balances per transaction. Requires companyId and connectionId path parameters. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing account balance objects. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity on pagination support, required parameters, and query parameter capabilities. Enhanced version specifies pagination, required inputs, filtering/sorting capabilities, and return structure for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'list-accounts' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic and doesn't indicate pagination. Description lacks input parameter details and pagination information. Enhanced version specifies pagination support, required path parameters, query parameter capabilities, and clarifies the rich data available in account objects for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
The *List accounts* endpoint returns a list of [accounts](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Account) for a given company's connection.

[Accounts](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Account) are financial accounts maintained by a bank or other financial institution.
 
Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated bank accounts for a company
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of bank accounts for a given company's connection. Bank accounts are financial accounts maintained by banks or financial institutions, containing rich data like balances, account numbers, and institution information. Requires companyId and connectionId path parameters. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing account objects. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't indicate pagination. Description lacks input parameter details and pagination information. Enhanced version specifies pagination support, required path parameters, query parameter capabilities, and clarifies the rich data available in account objects for better AI agent interpretability.

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific bank account by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single bank account for a given accountId. Bank accounts are financial accounts maintained by banks or financial institutions, containing rich data like balances, account numbers, and institution information. Requires companyId, connectionId, and accountId path parameters. Returns a single account object. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description doesn't clearly specify all required path parameters (companyId, connectionId, accountId). data.current_description:
The *List transaction categories* endpoint returns a list of [transaction categories](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/TransactionCategory) for a given company's connection.

[Transaction categories](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/TransactionCategory) are associated with a transaction to provide greater contextual meaning to transaction activity.

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of hierarchical transaction categories for a given company's connection. Transaction categories provide contextual meaning to transaction activity and are organized hierarchically. Requires companyId and connectionId path parameters. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing transaction category objects. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't indicate pagination or hierarchical nature. Description lacks input parameter details and pagination information. Enhanced version specifies pagination support, hierarchical structure, required parameters, and query capabilities for better AI agent understanding of this operation's purpose and usage.

data.current_description:
The *Get transaction category* endpoint returns a single transaction category for a given transactionCategoryId.

[Transaction categories](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/TransactionCategory) are associated with a transaction to provide greater contextual meaning to transaction activity.

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific transaction category by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single transaction category for a given transactionCategoryId. Transaction categories provide hierarchical contextual meaning to transaction activity. Requires companyId, connectionId, and transactionCategoryId path parameters. Returns a single transaction category object. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description doesn't clearly specify all required path parameters (companyId, connectionId, transactionCategoryId). Enhanced version explicitly lists all required inputs and clarifies the hierarchical nature of categories for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'list-bank-transactions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, inconsistent_terminology, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic and doesn't clarify this is company-wide (not connection-specific). Description is identical to connection-specific endpoint, creating confusion. Enhanced version clarifies this retrieves transactions across all connections for a company, specifies required parameters, and explains the key difference from the connection-specific variant for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
The *List transactions* endpoint returns a list of [transactions](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Transaction) for a given company's connection.

[Transactions](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Transaction) provide an immutable source of up-to-date information on income and expenditure.
 
Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated bank transactions across all connections
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of bank transactions for a given company across all connections. Transactions provide an immutable source of up-to-date information on income and expenditure. Requires companyId path parameter. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing transaction objects. Note: This endpoint differs from the connection-specific endpoint by aggregating transactions across all company connections. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't clarify this is company-wide (not connection-specific). Description is identical to connection-specific endpoint, creating confusion. Enhanced version clarifies this retrieves transactions across all connections for a company, specifies required parameters, and explains the key difference from the connection-specific variant for better AI agent understanding.
